A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I absolutely despised this film.

The last Jedi managed to run for 2 hours 30 minutes and not answer any questions or move the story forwards.

A mediocre string of sub plots\, riddled with an obvious political agenda.

Removing characters from the original trilogy one by one and stripping them of dignity and respect.

Forced humour to cover up the lack of story combined with shameless attempts to make more money by Disney Corporation have turned a beloved franchise into a cash cow with little respect to the original vision Lucas created 40 years ago. 

It took Disney 4 years and the better part of a billion dollars to kill Star Wars. Now they spit on its grave by making films that lack any creativity and disrespect what came before it.
